issues.description: Hero lacks 8-second comprehension test — 'operating system' metaphor unclear for SMBs
issues.rationale: Visitors won't grasp value prop before scrolling/bouncing. 'OS' too technical for small business owners.

issues.description: No sticky CTA creates conversion dead zones during long scroll
issues.rationale: User loses decision momentum between sections. Mobile users especially need persistent action path.

issues.description: Trust proof density too low — no audit logs or visibility panels above fold
issues.rationale: Control promise needs immediate proof. SMBs fear delegation without transparency evidence.

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking buries value prop below fold on smaller screens
issues.rationale: Mobile visitors miss core promise. Requires deliberate scroll to understand product.

issues.description: Pricing comprehension requires horizontal scroll on mobile
issues.rationale: Tier comparison friction increases abandonment. Mobile users can't see all options simultaneously.

issues.description: Section order buries social proof — should follow hero for trust momentum
issues.rationale: Trust signals come too late in scroll journey. Early skepticism causes premature bounce.

issues.description: Typography hierarchy weak — H2s blend with body text at mobile sizes
issues.rationale: Scan pattern breaks. Users can't quickly identify section value props while scrolling.

issues.description: Card components lack visual consistency — different shadows/radii break premium feel
issues.rationale: Inconsistent components erode trust. Premium positioning requires cohesive design system.

issues.description: FAQ accordion requires too many taps — objections buried in collapsed state
issues.rationale: Hidden objection handling increases hesitation. Key concerns should be visible immediately.

issues.description: Footer lacks trust badges and security certifications
issues.rationale: Final scroll position misses trust reinforcement opportunity before exit.

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace 'operating system' with 'control center' metaphor. Add visual dashboard preview showing delegation + monitoring.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete visual beats abstract concept. Dashboard preview demonstrates value immediately.

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky bottom bar (mobile) and side rail (desktop >1200px) with contextual CTA labels per section.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent conversion path maintains momentum. Context-aware labels reduce decision friction.

suggestedFixes.fix: Add live activity feed component (240px height) in hero showing real delegation events with timestamps.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Real-time proof demonstrates control promise. Timestamps build authenticity.

suggestedFixes.fix: Stack hero vertically: headline → subhead → mini proof bar → CTA within 568px viewport height.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Full value prop visible without scroll on iPhone SE. Proof bar maintains trust momentum.

suggestedFixes.fix: Convert to vertical card stack on mobile with swipe indicators. Highlight recommended tier with 4px border.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates horizontal scroll friction. Visual hierarchy guides to optimal choice.

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder: Hero → Proof Bar (logos/stats) → Problem/Solution → How It Works → Pricing → FAQ.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Trust-first sequencing reduces early bounce. Problem validation before features.

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase H2 to 24px mobile / 32px desktop. Add 600 font-weight. Maintain 1.2 line-height.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear visual breaks improve scanning. Weight differential creates hierarchy.

suggestedFixes.fix: Standardize all cards: 8px radius, 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08) shadow, 24px padding.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Consistent components build premium perception. Subtle shadows maintain depth.

suggestedFixes.fix: Show top 3 FAQs expanded by default. Add 'View all' link to dedicated FAQ page.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Critical objections addressed immediately. Progressive disclosure for edge cases.

suggestedFixes.fix: Add security badge row (SOC2, SSL, GDPR) above footer links. Include 'Your data is safe' microcopy.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Final trust reinforcement before exit. Security badges reduce last-minute hesitation.

assumptions: No existing design system defined — critiquing against standard conversion patterns
Hero content exists but lacks clarity based on brief
Pricing tiers exist but presentation unclear
